name: Fuji Electric TELLUS/TELLUS Lite越界读取漏洞
product: ["Fuji Electric Fuji Electric TELLUS <=v4.0.19.0", "Fuji Electric Fuji Electric TELLUS Lite <=v4.0.19.0"]
description: Fuji Electric TELLUS和Fuji Electric TELLUS Lite都是日本富士电机（Fuji Electric）公司的产品。Fuji Electric TELLUS是一款高级功能、用户友好性和远程控制专用软件。Fuji Electric TELLUS Lite是一个远程控制软件。Fuji Electric TELLUS和Fuji Electric TELLUS Lite存在越界读取漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致信息泄露或执行任意代码。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://monitouch.fujielectric.com/site/download-e/03tellus_inf/index.php
patch: Fuji Electric TELLUS/TELLUS Lite越界读取漏洞的补丁
